summary:
PROFESSIONAL PROFILE
In the Drilling Industry a common understanding exists that , approximately 20% Non-Productive Time due to externally sourced downhole tools&services failure events , is an acceptable ‘normal’ ( 'comfort zone' ). I believe through ample experience and achievements , that at least 15% can be eliminated to approx. 5% max.(and sustained) by applying a systematic operational-process approach that cultivates a pragmatic mindset which will manifest as , effective safety & improving performance results.. If applied across the wider contractor and supplier community , an operator can achieve to sustain such results of low-NPT and low-PS-events.

I master the skills , have the abilities & deep expertise to effectively perform, in the Drilling,Completions & Interventions Equipment&Services Inspection & Quality Assurance and Quality Control disciplines, with 28 years in this field, of which 21 years at a management level. 
Consolidated my management Experience & Expertise in QA/QC & QHSE in the Netherlands/UK , USA , Venezuela ,T&Tobago.
Conversant with SHELL-Global-Well-Delivery processes & Drilling-Dep. due to functioning effectively for 7-years in Brunei SHELL Petroleum. 
Conversant with BP-Global-Wells-Delivery processes & Drilling-Dep. due to functioning effectively for 5-years in BP-Oman contributing to deliver a considerable Tight-gas project , Khazzan-phase-I.
Excellent skills in applying Oilfield Drilling&Completions related standards & QM Process standards worldwide, like ISO-9001 and API-Q1 & API-Q2.

Specialties: 
-RootCause Failure Analysis 
-Ability to recognise patterns of Failure-Development-Processes before failure events occur.
